set_bitrate.name: Set bitrate command
set_bitrate.error: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** An error occurred while setting bitrate
set_bitrate.not_voice_channel: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** You must be in a voice channel to use this command

change_region.name: Change Region command
change_region.description: Set region for voice channel and get regions list
change_region.option_description: The region to set (or 'list' to see available regions)
change_region.illegal:
**{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** Region is illegal!!! 
 Use `{{-prefix}}{{alias}} {list}` to get list regions.
change_region.success: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** Voice region has been set to {{region}}
change_region.not_voice_channel: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}}, ** You must be in a voice channel to use this command

create_team.name: Create Team command
create_team.req_clan_settings: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}},** Server setting for clan is not setup yet. Contact admin for setup Clan Voice Setting
create_team.having_room: **{{-icon}}  | {{-author}},** You already own your own story room
create_team.error: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}},** An error occurred while creating clan room

room_member.name: Room Member command
room_member.description: Add or remove members from clan room
room_member.user_description: The user to add or remove
room_member.add_description: Add a member to the clan room
room_member.remove_description: Remove a member from the clan room
room_member.no_permission: **{{-icon}}  | {{-author}}, ** You don't have permission to add/remove member
room_member.invalid_command: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}},** Invalid command. Use add or remove
room_member.error: **{{-icon}} | {{-author}},** An error occurred while updating room members

server_clan_voice_setting.name: Server Clan Voice Setting command
server_clan_voice_setting.description: Configure clan voice settings for the server
server_clan_voice_setting.category_description: The first category for clan rooms
server_clan_voice_setting.category2_description: The second category for clan rooms
server_clan_voice_setting.category3_description: The third category for clan rooms
server_clan_voice_setting.allow_user_description: Allow users to create clan rooms
server_clan_voice_setting.success:

voice_setting.name: Voice Setting command
voice_setting.embed_description: Current voice settings for the server
voice_setting.embed_footer: Use the command buttons to modify settings
